plot: Tom moves to California to his Aunt's house. There he meets Finn. Finn teaches Tom how to surf and how to be just a regular "California kid." This movie is following the book "Tom Sawyer" ...
title: An American Summer
plot_es: Tom moves to California to his Aunt's house. There he meets Finn. Finn teaches Tom how to surf and how to be just a regular "California kid." This movie is following the book "Tom Sawyer" ...
